Anchorage.Joint Base Elmendorf\u2013Richardson:
Joint Base Elmendorf–Richardson (IATA: EDF, ICAO: PAED, FAA LID: EDF), or J-BER as it is known to most military members, is a United States military facility in Anchorage, the largest city in Alaska. It is an amalgamation of the United States Air Force's Elmendorf Air Force Base and the United States Army's Fort Richardson, which were merged in 2010.


== Overview ==
The adjacent facilities were officially combined by the 2005 Base Closure and Realignment Commission.
